metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39698 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In aio_poll_complete_work of aio.c, there is a possible memory corruptiondue to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-185125206References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
